creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: white card printed in black; rectangular image of linear silhouette of Santa Claus in sky behind a cottage in a snowy landscape with three very tall trees; graphic design of two radiating stars with snow; two banners with text above and below Santa Claus image:  "Christmas Greetings...from the Holzschuhs"
marks:
Signature and Inscription

URC on back, in penci LRC, in the print: [RH]
title: Christmas card with linear silhouette of Santa Claus and cottage
